grid.text: 5. Waki returns to his kneeling position, the ai-kyōgen exits the stage
8. Shite sings from inside the tsukurimono
5. Waki slides R. to face the tsukurimono.

captions.translation: the evening sun creates mountain shadows,
comes through the window and then leaves.
[JIUTAI] The faint sound of a hidden spring.

captions.transcription: Ame Genken ga toboso wo uruō su.
